Simulate opening lots of clue caskets.

**Usage**

- `/casket name:<string> quantity:<integer>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The casket you want to open. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | Yes | The quantity you want to open. | - |
